QuestData.Title: The Lady of Light
QuestData.Description: $n, yes? You are the one in charge here? I am Knight-Lord Dranarus, at your service.$B$BLady Liadrin has responded to a suspected demon presence near Auchindoun, southwest of here. She has asked specifically for your assistance in ensuring Auchindoun does not fall into Gul'dan's hands.$B$BIf you could set forth at your nearest convenience, I am sure the Lady would be most grateful.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Lady Liadrin at the Burning Front in Talador.
QuestData.RewardText: We'll have to catch up later. We have bigger problems!
